preface.title: Preface
preface.para: HSQLDB (HyperSQL DataBase) is a modern relational database manager that conforms closely to the SQL:2008 Standard and JDBC 4 specifications. It supports all core features and many of the optional features of SQL:2008.
The first versions of HSQLDB were released in 2001. Versions 1.9 and 2.0, first released in 2009, includes a complete rewrite of most parts of the database engine.

This documentation covers HyperSQL versions 1.9 and 2.0. Any reference to version 2.0 in this documentation also applies to version 1.9 unless it is stated otherwise. The latest, updated version of this documentation can be found at http://hsqldb.org/doc/2.0/

If you notice any mistakes in this document, please email the author listed at the beginning of the chapter. You can find the emails in the list of developers on the SourceForge project site via http://hsqldb.org. If you have problems with the procedures themselves, please use the HSQLDB support facilities which are listed at http://hsqldb.org/support
